sentences.sContent: Over the next five months, every one of them discouraged me from becoming a stockbroker.
sentences.sContent_eng: Over the next five months, every one of them discouraged me from becoming a stockbroker.
sentences.sCn: 接下来的五个月中，他们每个人都劝阻我不要做股票经纪人。

sentences.sContent: One of my clients was a stockbroker who happened to have a little farm on the side.
sentences.sContent_eng: One of my clients was a stockbroker who happened to have a little farm on the side.
sentences.sCn: 哈尔佛香说。 “我的一个客户是股票经纪人，碰巧另外有个小农场。

sentences.sContent: His father was a stockbroker, who met Oliver's French mother in Paris during the second world war.
sentences.sContent_eng: His father was a stockbroker, who met Oliver's French mother in Paris during the second world war.
sentences.sCn: 他的父亲是个股票经纪人，在第二次世界大战时的巴黎遇见了斯通的母亲。

words.tran: 股份，股票；库存；血统；树干
证券公司；[金融] 股票经纪人；股票投机商

trans.tranOther: a person or organization whose job is to buy and sell  shares  ,  bonds  etc for people
